title: What would happen if Loot Singed gets added to Nexus Blitz?
body: He will have poison permanently on with 50 ap per minute passed in the game and he will randomly fling people and throw goos. Rotates with Teemo and Veigar.

replies.body:
50 ap per minute?
no thanks.
lets say at 10 minutes, 500 AP
how the fuck am i suppose to survive? especially when hes also flinging me.
that's the point, you're not supposed to.
But that would encourage people to break rule #3 (I think it's still 3?) to not chase the singed!
I thought that was rule 34? Or am I mixing up everything again?
Not unless you’re into that sort of thing.
I am concerned of, but wouldn't be surprised at, the existance of r34 about chasing singed.
Isn't there a rule that says there is a genderbent version for rule 34?

I'd rather it get made another yordle, if they're going to add one. Loot Tristana would be cool, she could jump over walls and around the map, and after you deal a certain amount of damage to her she ults you away.

Or Loot Fizz. He jumps around with E and Q, and occasionally bursts you with W and R.

Or Loot Poppy. Occasionally she smacks you away with her R.

Or Loot Lulu. She could run away with her MS steroid while slowing and polymorphing anyone who damages her.
I can't see this being even slightly feasible unless he laughs every time something damages him.
He would get nerfed because people would still walk through the poison instead of to the side of it
Seems like that would be very unfair for melee champs.
new syndra tactic, instead of taking the loot event with you via W you now send it to the enemy to kill them
